ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Velious armor
ygData.msgSnippet: blizt you re a lucky man, no matter what I do I can t convince my girlfriend to play (I even showed her /gems) On the topic of velious armor, which would you
ygData.messageBody:
blizt you're a lucky man, no matter what I do I can't convince my girlfriend
to play (I even showed her /gems)

On the topic of velious armor, which would you guys wear between these 2:
imbrued bp
phase spider carapace

I'm thinking I'm gonna go for a phase bp as has more stats overall, but
drops 1-2 of em by 2-3 points.

Minkin

-----Original Message-----
From: blitz_krieg@... [mailto:blitz_krieg@...]
Sent: April 24, 2001 4:03 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Re: Velious armor


Yes and no.

Resonant (Thurgadin Quest) and Melodic (PoG Drop) are basically the
same. They have the same AC and have slightly different stat
modifiers. 3 dex 2 cha on one vs. 3 cha 2 dex on another kinda thing.

Kael and Skyshrine Quest Armors are superior to both Resonant and
Melodic and are roughly equivelant to each other. Kael armor has
higher AC, Skyshrine has higher stat values (including resists).

I'll be eventually angling after Skyshrine Armor for a couple
reasons. Many guilds have already gone after Kael armor, so they'll
be less competition for Skyshrine (I hope) and at the super high AC
these armor already have, if I lose 2 or 3 ac per piece but gain
across the board in resists, I think I'll be better off overall.

Plus, it appears the Caster armor is better out of Skyshrine than
Kael, and my GF plays a mage.... :)

Darkfox
Xegony

> Is it not true that all the velious armor has basically the same
stats but are arrived at through different avenues depending on what
factions you want to destroy?
>
> i.e. Melodic = Resonant = Troubador ?
>
> -Faras
